website_summaries.verdict: Extremely low price point for puppy food. Owners report their puppies love the taste of this formula.
pros: Includes DHA nutrient specifically for eye and brain development
Even picky eaters love the taste, customers say
Owners report minimal problems with digestion
cons: Some customers report receiving bags of rancid food
Some puppies may only eat the meat flavored kibbles, leaving the rest

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: This bag of dog food nearly killed my dog.... It is contaminated with something because when we started feeding it back to her we had the same issues all over again.
customer_reviews.author: Cierra Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Food looks over-cooked
customer_reviews.text: I've been having this brand of dog food delivered for the past 6 months and this past delivery has been the worst. When I opened the bag it looked over cooked to the point that it may be burnt. I took a chance with it instead of sending it back but now both of my 13 month old pups have developed very loose stools. Considering that they have very controlled potty times, I don't this is something that they are eating while on their routine walks. Very disappointed with Purina One right now.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Targgart

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: PLEASE DO NOT BUY THIS. I just fed my poor baby this today and he pooped himself everywhere and is puking! You can see from the photo. He feels so horrible you can tell by his behavior. He is curled up and shaking. I feel so terrible having fed him this. Please do not buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Aldana

customer_reviews.title: Possibly a bad batch? Made my dogs both very ill.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs ate this for months. Not sure If it was a bad batch but the last bag i opened has made them so sick. Went to the vet twice. Uncontrollable vomiting and diarrhea. Got probiotics. Switched food. All was well. Thought I would give it a try again thinking it possibly wasn’t the food. I was wrong. They both puked within an hour of eating. Completely undigested. Would love to know If there is any way to have the remaining portion tested for mold or bacteria.
customer_reviews.author: spickard

customer_reviews.title: The ingredients are clear and natural; the price is quite reasonable; the delivery is timely
customer_reviews.text: The price is reasonably good on this food, and it is easy on the system, as it contains non-allergenic ingredients for my super-sensitive big baby! When you look at the ingredients, the main ones are as they should be - meat (protein) vegetables, etc. You can read the ingredients and identify them without needing a dictionary to know what they are. I like to know what I'm feeding my dog, and apparently he likes to know what he's eating, too, considering how many foods it's taken me to get to this point! This line of foods, wet and dry, are very good.
customer_reviews.author: St Bernard Mom

customer_reviews.title: Old, terrible Dog food,
customer_reviews.text: I bought one bag on chewy.com last time, this time i got it on Amazon, it's so terrible, it looks like very old, the color is different, and it's kind powdering. The dry meat is small and dark, compare to the first bag I bought is so different. There is no production date on the bag, I had to open it to know the food is no good. I am afraid that my dog might get sick from eating that food... I will never buy dog food from amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: cathy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Puppy Food
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Purina ONE Puppy since it first hit the stores. We breed and show German Shepherd Dogs and Australian Shepherds. Both breeds are high energy and need to be kept in top condition. The dogs all love this food - puppies and adults. We feed Purina ONE Puppy to our expectant moms a few weeks after we breed them and keep the moms on it all through nursing. Everyone has a beautiful coat, high energy, and excellent help. Good body tone. No fatties here. Try it. Your pup will love it, and so will you.
customer_reviews.author: DaMerz

customer_reviews.title: My puppy and I are pleased with this food.
customer_reviews.text: I have an American Bulldog Puppy who is growing way to fast and her joints hurt her. Our vet said this is common in large breed dogs. So we decided to try this food for her and with rest and this large breed food she is doing much better. When she is a year old we plan to try the large breed adult food as well. My puppy and I are pleased with this food. I would recommend this for large breed dogs.
customer_reviews.author: TMC

customer_reviews.title: Best Price With Free Auto-Delivery
customer_reviews.text: Our vet recommended this food and we cannot be happier. She loves it. When I found it on Amazon with auto-delivery, free delivery and the lowest price, we couldn’t have done better. 10/3/19 she still loves this food. I wish it came in bigger bags because the 16.5# bag does not last until the next delivery. We have to get an 8# bag locally for $12.39. I’d like to buy it here but they want approx $20.00. Whew!!!!! Way too much for me. But a larger size would be great 👍.
customer_reviews.author: Love-A-GoodBargain

customer_reviews.title: Rottweiler approved
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many different foods with my Rottweiler one and a half year-old . She likes this one the best she doesn’t give me problems eating it she weighs 95 pounds I give her 3 cups in the morning and 3 cups for dinner I also add in a tablespoon of the Purina one smart blend wet food and a quarter cup of fresh vegetables and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: kayla taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great food but SHAME on AMAZON for subscribe and save price increases
customer_reviews.text: My puppy is doing well with this dog food. Our vet says it's a good choice and we should stick with this brand into adulthood. My only issue is with AMAZON and their subscribe and save feature. I signed up in March. The 1st order arrived and the price was great. The 2nd month of my subscription the price went up over $10 per bag and I wasn't even notified. I was sent an email saying it had shipped and that was it. Moral to the story great dog food but if you subscribe to receive monthly watch Amazon's prices closely. I am very disappointed in Amazon and will not subscribe again.
customer_reviews.author: Mama03

customer_reviews.title: Very happy Shepherd!
customer_reviews.text: We have been using Purina dog food since getting our German Shepherd at 8 weeks old. We initially started her on the Pro Plan (recommended by our vet) but one day she quit eating it. Wanting to stay within the brand (also recommended), we chose Smartblend for Large Breed. Our sheppy absolutely loves it and has been eating that for 6 months. It has texture (soft and crunchy) and overall taste seems to be better for her. We are currently transitioning to adult food, staying with the Smartblend Large Breed. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: GiGiAZ

customer_reviews.title: Huge dog likes it and growing well.
customer_reviews.text: We have been feeding this to our great dane/mastiff mix since early puppy-hood. He's healthy, well-nourished, and is growing very well, just following the recommended feeding schedule on the bag. He's put on about 85 pounds in the past 10 months and is energetic and in excellent health. He goes through this 31 pound bag in about 3 weeks. I wish amazon would let me subscribe for deliveries more frequently than once a month.
customer_reviews.author: John T Haley

customer_reviews.title: My Vet approves!
customer_reviews.text: We have a 5 month old Belgian Malinois, that loves this. We bought the Purina One puppy chow for large breeds. It was a little "rich" for her, so we found that if we mix it 50:50 with regular Purina Puppt chow for large breeds, she eats it well and tolerates it better. She is over 50 lbs right now and just turned 5 months, and her coat is just beautiful and shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No expiration date!
customer_reviews.text: The price is good and came quickly but will not purchase again because we searched the total bag and it has no expiration date! All bags in the stores have one.
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: Purina One large dog puppy food
customer_reviews.text: my 2 Rottweiler puppies (8 weeks old) have not done well on 4 other dog food brands that I've bought for them but they seem to like this one. maybe because its a bit softer than the others & has a nice smell which other brands had none. So far so good
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: Made my pup ill...
customer_reviews.text: Thought I'd make a switch from dried food (Purina Pro Plan Probiotics Dry Puppy Food) to wet food, o tried this as its specifically meant for puppies (Purina ONE SmartBlend Natural Puppy Dog Food). Not a good result - Made my 3month old pup throw up and get bad diarrhea. :-( Now I have several cases that I guess I'll donate to the local dog shelter!
customer_reviews.author: S.Cutter

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for dogs!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs really like the flavor of this food. They said it is much better than that generic stuff they used to have, but not quite as good as that cold cut sammich they stole off the counter while I was practicing the routine from that iconic scene in Flashdance. I think it's a bit dry and bland but my dogs must really love this stuff because twice a day, they line up, ready to eat.
customer_reviews.author: El Dee

customer_reviews.title: Food got my dog sick.
customer_reviews.text: After buying this my lab didn’t finish his food for the first time since we got him....almost a year ago. Tried to feed him four more times and he never finished his food which is weird. This morning he ate a few pieces and puked. Went to Walmart and bought the same exact food and fed him again literally 25 minutes after he puked and he scarfed the whole bowl up. Also noticed hardly any chicken in the amazon bag. The Walmart bag is full of chicken.
customer_reviews.author: Ja Ke

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Puppy Food!!
customer_reviews.text: My puppy LOVES this Lamb and Rice food! I add it to his kibble also Purina One!! It is fresh, no dings or dents on the cans! Well packaged too!! When I pop the lid my puppy comes running! I’ll continue to purchase this from Amazon!! Speedy delivery and always have what I need!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl McMillan

customer_reviews.title: Something is wrong with the one on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Like others have noted, this food is not the same as the one purchased from Target. There is a noticeable difference! I purchased the bag from amazon and started noticing that my puppy didn’t want to eat his food. I figured he was just bored of it but purchased a bag from Target. My puppy immediately ate the food from the one purchased at Target. I am not sure what is going on but don’t buy it from amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffani

customer_reviews.title: Great food!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing dog food! Love the Amazon delivery. I see so many negative reviews but personally have never received anything I would buy anywhere else. Dogs live it and have never seen bugs, bad looking food or a short expiration life. This bag I just got has a best buy of Jan 2022!
customer_reviews.author: Cloudskurfer

customer_reviews.title: A godsend for our shelter. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: We spent over a thousand dollars treating hot spots on our Pyrenees only to learn he was allergic to our dog food. Purina One has been a godsend. Our sanctuary has over 40 dogs. They all get purina one! We use at least two thirty pound bags a day but it is worth it to have healthy pups.
customer_reviews.author: Angela m McElroym

customer_reviews.title: Good Cost for the amount = ). Pup digs it.
customer_reviews.text: My pup loves this stuff. He also eats grass and basically everything that will fit in his mouth. He literally swallowed an entire beef hide. But he seems happy when we feed him this. His coat is nice and shiny. Great amount for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: My puppy loves this food!
customer_reviews.text: My puppy loves this food! Have tried him on others but his tummy couldn’t handle it. He was getting diarrhea from everything I was giving him. My vet recommended this and glad she did! He’s having no more tummy issues! He gets so excited just when I take the van out of the cupboard. Highly recommend this for puppies with stomach sensitivity. The lamb and rice mix is what I believe helps. Good value as well. I’ve looked else where and Amazon is the cheapest!
customer_reviews.author: Angeline K.

customer_reviews.title: Premium puppy food at a value price
customer_reviews.text: I guess the taste is good my dog eats it so i dont know personally if i think it tastes good. Fed this to my pup for a lil over a year and she always ate it. Seemed to promote growth and a nice coat. Quality seemed better than most dog foods ive given to my dogs. I have a blur heeler australian cattle dog mix. It gives her enough butrients for her hyperactive lifestyle. I paid about 12 to 13 dollars a bag for the 16.5 lb bag. Really great value for a puppy food i found to be on par with other so called premium brands.
customer_reviews.author: It-is-wut-it-is

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy
customer_reviews.text: The product was fine but subscribe and save did not work out. When I checked late last week it said not available then when I checked Monday it said delivery by the 9th. It came today, which would be good if the price had not increased $8.00. I bought the large size because it was a good value. It is not at this price. I have cancelled it from my list and am checking my other subscribe and safe buys.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Thurman

customer_reviews.title: Better than "premium" puppy food!
customer_reviews.text: The breeder we got our dogs from suggested Pro Plan but the babies didn't seem to like it too much just dry. So we researched and went to Blue Buffalo small breed puppy... they both broke out in bumps all over and that terrified us. Our vet said give this brand and variety a shot and wow. They love it. Has real meat and once a week, we mix in a raw farm fresh egg for them.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Deccent food!
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old gsp loves it and he is a very picky eater so in my book you can't go wrong. as far as the quality goes i dont have any complaints it seems as if its higher quality then a few of the other brands we tried including Iams. the food is consistent with each bag where iams didn't seem to be. all in all would recommend. take care of those puppers all!!!
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Digests easier than any other product I tried with my dog
customer_reviews.text: My dog was having a difficult time keeping her food in her system long enough to get good nutrition... the yard was a disaster if you get my drift... now it is manageable, and she is thriving. Enough said.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: My PUp LoVeS THiS!!!
customer_reviews.text: My pup Loves it especially the chicken bites,,his fav since I got him ay 8 weeks old..we have added a grain free food into this mix which agrees with my littke chihuahua BaZinGA..he's healthy ,at weight, the vet has complimented him on his coat as he is a long coat..and it really agrees with his tummy..keeps his teeth clean and white
customer_reviews.author: eatcrow

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for development of fat, muscle, and perfect coats! Perfect for Bully Breeds!
customer_reviews.text: ONE Puppy canned mixed with Pro Plan Sport is what I feed my American Bullies from weaning to 1 year. I also feed it to my adults when getting ready for show time. It's never failed us. Strong, fat, healthy pups and adults put on good muscle tone when fed this. Also highly recommended to mix Greek yogurt with this for dogs with sensitive skin and gut health.
customer_reviews.author: TBishop

customer_reviews.title: Food almost killed my dog
customer_reviews.text: This product almost KILLED my 16 week old puppy! As soon as I gave her this dog food she immediately started throwing up and had dirreah! She was hospitalized twice and the doctors told me she had food poisoning. After examining the food more thoroughly, I found MOLD in it! I made a claim through Purina and they stated that it is the way AMAZON is storing their product! STAY AWAY from this food!
customer_reviews.author: ProfEng

customer_reviews.title: Pups love, bad cans, price spikers.
customer_reviews.text: I went through the effort to switch my puppies to this brand because they didnt seem to like the the Pedigree wet puppy food and since then I've recieved a case with 2 dented and rotten cans in it and now they've doubled the price!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Josie

customer_reviews.title: A smart blend and a smart choice!
customer_reviews.text: I tried a few different puppy-formulated foods when I first got my pup last August (she was 4 months at the time, a black lab mix) and most of them upset her stomach and made her irregular. I was super relieved when I found Purina ONE's puppy food. Not only is it affordable (less than $13 for am 8 lb bag) but it's also all natural and looks like real food, not awkward brown shapes, like most dog food. And she loves it. She hasn't had a single digestive issue since putting her on this food! That and long list of benefits that it provides toward her development make this the best puppy food money can buy.
customer_reviews.author: Cory D.

customer_reviews.title: Picky Pup Approved!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our puppy is very picky on food, and she loves this one! I was having to put wet dog food on the otber brand we tried and she has yucky mushy poop. But she loves this food, and her poop is much easier to clean up!
customer_reviews.author: John&BriThomas

customer_reviews.title: High Quality of Dog Food recommended by our Vet.
customer_reviews.text: We tried this dog food for our new rescue pup and she loves it. Mahala has gone from 5 pounds to 15 pounds in no time. The bowl is always wiped clean. I give her 1/2 can in the AM & 1/2 can in the PM with dry food in her bown for nibbling on during the day. The dry food is also Purina's. Great dog food and reasonable pricing.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Good quality alternative to Purina Pro Plan
customer_reviews.text: Started my puppy out on Purina Pro Plan after switching from what the breeder used. Puppy did great on Pro Plan, but I also wanted to try the Purina ONE Smartblend at this great price, even though the Amazon price for Pro Plan is still very good. So far, she loves the ONE and her poops are still good. Another bonus is that this is available at the local grocery store if I need some in a hurry. Only drawback initially is that she made a mess around her bowl trying to get to the chewy morsels! Will decide after this bag if we need to go back to Pro Plan.
customer_reviews.author: ememen

customer_reviews.title: Purina ONE Puppy Value
customer_reviews.text: I consider this a great value. What's the point of spending your money on more expensive food if they won't eat it? I've got 3 dogs, (2 almost 4, & the 3rd almost 2), they love the puppy food, apparently it tastes good, and they prefer the smaller bites. It also appears they require less to satisfy their appetites. I hope it's available when I need to order more!
customer_reviews.author: D. Hazle

customer_reviews.title: The pup really seemed to like it but then again he also likes eating my ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a 3 month old husky. The pup really seemed to like it but then again he also likes eating my shoes. I gave it a week t see if he would adjust to the new food but he ended up with diarrhea 3 times a day. I switched to blue buffalo and immediately saw a difference in his mannerisms, more solid food, and a happier pup.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Good food
customer_reviews.text: Dogs enjoy the food. Cats enjoy the food. Cats are diabetic...so I spend a lot of time picking it up and putting it down, trying to keep the cats out of it. The dogs really do enjoy it though. Solid ingredient list for the price. I get 2 bags a month through subscribe and save. I will probably continue with this brand for the foreseeable future.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Bedinghaus

customer_reviews.title: Great Tasting Dog Food!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves Purina One Smartblend and has been eating this food for the last two years. He begs at the kitchen counter when he hears me open the can up. He will eat much more if given to him but of course we limit his diet but he is a big lab, 11 years old and still healthy and has lots of energy. I am sure Purina One Smartblend contributes to his lasting health. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Bootsy57

customer_reviews.title: My pup loves this food!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 6-month-old boxer/basset hound mix and I had a hard time finding food that his little body could tolerate when I first got him at 12 weeks. This food has been a lifesaver for us! He LOVES it and it's been so, so good for his little body. He doesn't get gassy and have loose stool like he did before. It also doesn't have that gross lingering dog food smell!
customer_reviews.author: biz

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I have always bought Purina One for my older dogs and they loved it. So when I got a puppy I had no idea they made food for puppies so I tried it. It is a great value for the money and the puppy loves it. I have always used Purina one as the food gave my dogs beautiful coats of hair so I am sure the puppy will benefit as well.
customer_reviews.author: JCOhio

customer_reviews.title: Great food
customer_reviews.text: When I first got my pup she was eatting a mix of two pretty expensive foods. My other dogs already eat this brand of food and they love it! It would take her all day just to eat one meal when she should’ve been eatting three, now she eats up fast(maybe to fast) and has lots of energy!
customer_reviews.author: Sara F

customer_reviews.title: Brand that we trust
customer_reviews.text: We trust this brand no matter the formula and even when watching a recent commercial when compared to another brand, the small print on commercial stated that both brands are nutritionally complete even though the other brand ranks itself superior to Purina. We will stick with Purina thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Joy A. Rector

customer_reviews.title: Product Should Be RECALLED
customer_reviews.text: I foster a lot of dogs and received this product from the rescue organization. First two bags were good and I switched my own dogs to this food. Ordered two more bags from Amazon and all of my dogs became immediately sick when I started the new bags (vomiting/diarrhea). Ran some tests on the dogs and they had no worms or any other problems so concluded it was the food. Called Purina and they didn't seem to care much. Sent me 25 cent coupons as compensation for having 7 sick dogs. I have recently seen other people posting that their dogs are getting sick on this food. Purina needs to do a RECALL!
customer_reviews.author: Morning Sun

customer_reviews.title: Awful breath!
customer_reviews.text: I know gave this a 3 star because this makes my dogs breath smell like rotten meat. I tried it with a few different puppies & their nice puppy breath turned rancid with in just a few days. That makes me a little worried about if this will affect their teeth since they have such bad breath. I threw half a bag out just so I could switch foods right away.
customer_reviews.author: Pitty Mama

customer_reviews.title: Made my pup sick
customer_reviews.text: I raise a guide dog and this is the food that we are supposed to feed them, but it made my pup have really bad diarrhea. I know most dogs are different and some have more sensitive stomachs (why gave this 3 stars), but when I switched to Purina Pro Plan there were no issues!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Puppy likes the food
customer_reviews.text: This food was recommended by the shelter I adopted my puppy from and he's been eating it since I've had him. Haven't needed to switch or mix wet food in yet. We've been through 5 bags so far.
customer_reviews.author: RYAN C

customer_reviews.title: Newfie fan!
customer_reviews.text: Our Newfie loves it! As our guy keeps getting bigger we were struggling to keep up on his previous expensive brand. After consulting our vet, she suggested this as a quality less expensive brand. He doesn’t eat more of it, his #2’s are good, no stinky floofs. Amazon delivers it to our door at an affordable price. What more can you ask for?!
customer_reviews.author: Karri Mc.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy from Amazon! Smells terrible and my puppy doesn't eat it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this same food from other shops and I was happy with it. But the last two I bought off of Amazon smell like they've gone bad, my dog doesn't eat it and the food gave him terrible diarrhea.
customer_reviews.author: Emre

customer_reviews.title: My puppy loves it
customer_reviews.text: Our first bag came and in the box there were a bunch of ants. (Could of sat in the warehouse too long or in the shipping box too long, idk) I told amazon, and they sent me another bag no questions asked and luckily didn’t have me send back the first bag/box with ants. Next bag came great and my puppy loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Great food and my dog love it
customer_reviews.text: Product arrive timely and as described, enough amount for the entire month so I enroll on the subscription and don’t have to worry about to buy it again. My dog love it, her fur is shine and soft, and she is healthy. What else would I ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Julio C. Rios

customer_reviews.title: High quality dog food. Smells like tuna.
customer_reviews.text: My puppy eats the Purina Pro Plan Chicken and Turkey canned dog food. I thought it would be a good idea to add a third flavor - Lamb. Unfortunately, my puppy did not like this at all. It has a very strong fish odor (smells like tuna), and I think this is why he doesn't like it. The ingredients on the can list 'ocean fish' as the 6th ingredient, but Amazon doesn't. I contacted Amazon and they kindly issued a refund. I'm giving it 5 Stars because the food is very high quality and I wish my puppy would have liked it. I'll be donating it.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: My puppy hates it, and he loves all food...
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this food from the store and my puppy loves it. I bought it from amazon, and he will not eat it. Something is wrong with it. Complete waste of money. When I bought a new bag from the store, he ate it just like before.
customer_reviews.author: C Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Poo tells all!
customer_reviews.text: This sounded great since no fillers are used....but this made my dogs poo fluffy. The ingredients seem exactly like the pro plan purina as well. He quit eating it as well as he used to eat once he was on this solely after I had been mixing it with his prior food to gradually introduce it.
customer_reviews.author: K.Nic

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs go crazy over this food. If we run out and pick up something else, they won't touch it. It is so weird. I have no idea what is so great about this particular one, but I am now buying 2 bags a month on Subscribe and Save just to make my two puppies happy!
customer_reviews.author: EH

customer_reviews.title: Poison
customer_reviews.text: This food made our dog incredibly sick! Terrible batch of food! The food was stale, had soggy pieces, questionable chunks in it and made my dog puke the few times I tired to feed it to him. We have bought this food on amazon for over a year every month and never had issues until this last monthly shipment.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Brown

customer_reviews.title: Vet recommended to us
customer_reviews.text: Our veterinarian recommended this as the only food for our dog with green beans as treats. This is one of the only dry foods we have ever given to him that he doesn't turn his nose up to. He is a very healthy dog and enjoys this food very much, sometimes too much it seems.
customer_reviews.author: greg1174

customer_reviews.title: My puppy did not eat this food
customer_reviews.text: This was the brand that my little guy had eaten before we took him home. We did not want to change his diet and that was a big mistake on our part. He would only eat it when he was very hungry. In the last week we have changed him to a different food product and he has gained over 2.5 pounds and he was only 7.5 to begin with. He is now 10.25 pounds and I will never feed him this food again. Others may have better experiences but I know now that my dog did not like the food.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better option
customer_reviews.text: One of the better foods you can buy. My izzy turned her nose up to Pedigree so I began searching for a better, healthier dog food. This was it. Shes happy and eager to eat everyday. Shes healthy and that makes me happy! All my animals, dogs & cats eat purina one!
customer_reviews.author: Mandii McMillan

customer_reviews.title: Puppies Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I had to switch puppy food since one of my puppies was allergic to their other food. Both puppies love this food. One of the puppies was not a big eater but always eats this. I had gotten this due to the on line recommendation and it did not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Pittie Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great price to product ratio!!
customer_reviews.text: The price to product ratio was super great for this. My dog wasn’t the biggest fan of it so we ended up switching to a different kind when this bag was gone, but it was worth the try for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great all around food.
customer_reviews.text: I bought only one bag from Amazon and it was good but after reading the reviews I decided to go with Chewy as I think they turn over more dog food and I didn’t want to take the chance in mold from sitting somewhere too long. Love this food! I raise Standard Poodles and they all love it. Shiny coats, energy, cleaner teeth too :) Anyone switching foods I definitely would do it slowly.
customer_reviews.author: ARose

customer_reviews.title: Great nutrition
customer_reviews.text: I have used Purina puppy chow for every pup I have raised. I now have an 8 month old Shepard that I rescued and am feeding him Purina puppy chow for large breed. He was emaciated when I got him and has gone from 48 lbs to 72 lbs in short order. He loves it and the vet is impressed with his progress. I will stand by this product forever.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps pup in good body condition
customer_reviews.text: I like the palatability. We are raising a Corgi pup on it and he has never turned it down. It seem to give him loads of energy!
customer_reviews.author: horsecrazy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and value
customer_reviews.text: Puppies and momma dog love. I think the momma now ways more than she did before she was pregnant. Vet was amazed at her great health. Puppies are healthy and momma did not get skinny feeding them as she was eating this food.
customer_reviews.author: Melany

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really works! My beautiful yellow puppy was hungry, so I ordered this puppy food. When it arrived, I put it in her bowl, and she ate it. Now she isn't hungry anymore. It really works! (Seriously, though, my dog seems to thrive on Purina. Even when we've tried to switch her to a more expensive brand, she doesn't seem to appreciate it. She's happy, healthy and well fed...for a great price.)
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Best price
customer_reviews.text: This is the best price we have found for this food. Everywhere else local or online is more expensive, and we go through a lot because we have a growing great pyr that loves to eat
customer_reviews.author: MsGVHfish

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We have been feeding this to our 9 month old Golden Retriever puppy since she was 8 weeks old, per the recommendation of the breeder. Our puppy loves it. We have had no issues with it until this month when the Amazon price doubled. We ended up purchasing it from another site.
customer_reviews.author: MrsKJS

customer_reviews.title: Cost effective food. Chicken pieces are great, rest of kibble is average for my picky golden doodle.
customer_reviews.text: Puppy loves the chicken pieces but doesn’t like the triangle pieces so I mix it with Hills Science brand and give it . He’s happily eating the mix. So averages my cost out and get the best of both good brands - growth is perfect, no digestive or skin issues.
customer_reviews.author: Chet

customer_reviews.title: Dog Meat
customer_reviews.text: I did not taste or smell this... it’s dog food. Real Meat as ingredient is the good thing, many others are mostly grain. My girl is spoiled, she will be big boned with MEAT and potatoes... I do add other protein to her diet. It’s my dog it is my responsibility to care for her this is part of how I do that
customer_reviews.author: LB Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great food with real chicken.
customer_reviews.text: My puppy loves this food especially because it has lots of chicken pieces in it. However be careful because it has more natural ingredients. My puppy had uncontrollable diarrhea the few few days of eating it, so I recommend switching them over gradually of this is their first time having it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s our new favorite brand
customer_reviews.text: Our dog seems to LOVE IT. A vet actually highly recommended this brand and all the research the company has done for their products. There’s freeze dried chicken in it which is wonderful. Only downside is our dog has stinky gas haha but small price to pay
customer_reviews.author: banana bear

customer_reviews.title: Made my dog sick.
customer_reviews.text: Like several other reviews, this food made my dog sick. She was vomiting. We switched her back to the store bought food (exactly the same brand) and she stopped vomiting. The kibbles looked different from other bags we have bought. I won't be buying it anywhere other than at the store from now on, lesson learned. Amazon did refund my money.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Newkirk

customer_reviews.title: My dogs do not like it although I love it because of Glucosamine
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately my dogs do not love this item. However, I still purchased them once in a while. To make them eat I have to mix with wet foods because I need to them to consume Glucosamine. I will also buy more pills version.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Chia

customer_reviews.title: My Labrador Loves it
customer_reviews.text: My labrador puppy loves the food. Not saying much there though. Think he will eat anything. My vet did recommend it. He does seem to have a shiny coat. This price is the best I have found. Very nice, to have it delivered to my door.
customer_reviews.author: Birddog

customer_reviews.title: Made my pup sick.
customer_reviews.text: I am subscribed to this dog food for a couple months now. But this batch of dog food made my dog really sick. Throwing up diarrhea everything. I went to the store and bought the same brand of dog food and my dog isn’t sick anymore. I will not be purchasing this dog food from amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: Dogs love it. Kids said it didn’t taste like chicken though. I do not recommend adding milk for breakfast cereal.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Pace

customer_reviews.title: Not sure what happened but...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what happened but this bag made my puppy super sick. She's always eaten this food from the pet stores here and never had an issue, but after opening the new bag from Amazon and feeding it to her she ended up getting sick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Caused constipation
customer_reviews.text: Our puppy liked this food but after feeding it to her a few times, it really stopped her up. I gave some to my daughter to feed her dog, in case it was just a fluke, but it made her dog constipated too. If your dog generally has loose stools, this might work well, but not for our pup.
customer_reviews.author: FLMOM

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: Gave my corgi puppy excessive diarrhea with blood in his stool. Took him to the vet, no parasites or bacteria. We stopped feeding him this wet food after reading reviews of other people experiencing the same problem. After 2 days, his poops are completely back to normal. Will never purchase this wet food again.
customer_reviews.author: Glen Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: I loved this product buy my dogs system did not
customer_reviews.text: The breeder recommended this product as that is what is feed all the time in their kennel But my puppy developed and allergy to it and we move on to the next choice. Sad Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Pop pops

customer_reviews.title: Made my Dog VERY sick
customer_reviews.text: Have been feed to my puppy for 3 months. ( noy purchased on Amazon) Food purchase from amazon has cost me $400 + in vet bills because of the SERVERE Diarrhea it gave him. Vet confirmed not medical issues. It must be the food, AND IT WAS!
customer_reviews.author: FFD3RD

customer_reviews.title: Favorite dog food, my pups love the chicken chunks!
customer_reviews.text: I use the adult version for my two older dogs who love the chicken chunks & One of them has tummy issues with most other kinds of food but not this Purina! When we got our new puppy he had the pedigree poops and was gassy so we immediately switched to the puppy brand of Purina and he loves it! His stomach is so much better too & this is the BEST pricing / size I've ever found!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Brown

customer_reviews.title: Won’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: My dogs not even getting close to it! Won’t buy it again! Never!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for large breed puppies.
customer_reviews.text: We feed our pregnant Labrador retriever. Her first litter she had 6 16oz puppies. We are on our second litter and we will soon have results on their sizes. We also kept feed the puppies for 1 year and they are all healthy and rearing to go anywhere. We also keep feeding mommy until she has weened the pups.
customer_reviews.author: John Henrich

customer_reviews.title: Expired puppy food....
customer_reviews.text: Received my order a day late AND the food expired 4 months ago.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: Better value, less fancy.
customer_reviews.text: Our pup devours this food. We tried the more expensive ones but she always comes back to this. I’m guessing she likes the taste and texture of it compared to the “fancier” dog foods out there. Don’t get me wrong she will eat anything, but she really likes this brand/flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Found the one
customer_reviews.text: I love that it asks flavor like I'm going to be eating it haha. My pups love it. My shepherd has very sensitive skin and since we have been giving him this he has stopped chewing. His coat is my healthier. We have finally found the right food for our pup
customer_reviews.author: V M

customer_reviews.title: Great for my Rotty mix
customer_reviews.text: I've been feeding this since my pup was eight weeks old. This pup is half Rott and half Lab. He's on free choice feeding and has thrived on this feed. He's 18 months old and over 90 lbs. Coat looks shiny. Will probably feed this till he's 24 months old.
customer_reviews.author: Philip D. Holland

customer_reviews.title: Torn bag...
customer_reviews.text: The bag was torn open and dog food was EVERYWHERE!!!!! I got about 1/4 dog food left in the bag and I'm not risking giving the open contents to my puppy. Who knows what the open contents may have been around while in the box...
customer_reviews.author: Randy D.

customer_reviews.title: Great puppy food!
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 middle age dogs and a puppy. We've been struggling to get the puppy to eat the puppy food, as he wants what big siblings are having. This food is the first puppy food he's been excited to eat!! Bonus, it's top ten vet recommended for puppies!
customer_reviews.author: benny wright

customer_reviews.title: My puppy loves it will not buy her anything else
customer_reviews.text: My 3 month old gigantic puppy loves this food I will not buy her anything else she's going through one bag a month where she gets full of grown I guess I have to buy two
customer_reviews.author: Robin Yancey

customer_reviews.title: My puppy loves this brand!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what they put in their food, but my puppy loves this brand! He is a mini husky. I had gone through a few puppy foods and my puppy only ate them when he absolutely had to. The Purina One blend was the only one that he would eat right when we poured it. Definitely would recommend. I'm also going to move on to the Purina Dog food when he's ready for adult dog food.
customer_reviews.author: CrimSoul

customer_reviews.title: One bad bag
customer_reviews.text: I suspect we got a bad batch. Our seven month old puppy couldn’t keep it down after several months of not having a problem. Canceled our subscription anyway because one bad bag was enough.
customer_reviews.author: mkb

customer_reviews.title: My Puppy Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: My puppy has been trying a few puppy foods. And this one by far is her favorite. It took a while. But I’m glad I found the perfect food. I noticed her stool is softer (sorry tmi) And I think it’s because it’s not dry food nor wet. It’s like the perfect combination of both. She eats it within seconds. So I know she loves it. We are sticking with it.
customer_reviews.author: Francesca

customer_reviews.title: Great for pup
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing deal! This bag will last my pup through just about the entire month. Way cheaper than going to the store to buy a few of the smaller (4 lb) bags! Plus, he loves it and it's helping to keep him healthy!
customer_reviews.author: rbertr4

customer_reviews.title: Puppy doesn't like the flavor
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our 10 week old puppy and he only likes the chicken bits, he tends to avoid the squares and triangles. Now he won't even eat it unless I mix it with something like cheese or peanut butter. I guess he doesn't like the flavor very much by itself but is fine with it when mixed with a stronger flavor.
customer_reviews.author: DB & PML-B

product_meta.title: Purina ONE Natural Dry Puppy Food, SmartBlend Healthy Puppy Formula - 16.5 lb. Bag
product_meta.description: Your family's new puppy has unique needs, and you can help tend to those needs when you serve him Purina ONE SmartBlend Natural Healthy Puppy Formula dry puppy food. Real chicken is the #1 ingredient, and rice and oatmeal round out this recipe to give your growing puppy the nutrition he needs. Every serving of this dry puppy food contains DHA, a nutrient also found in mother's milk, to support his vision and brain development, and an antioxidant blend helps to promote a strong immune system. This puppy formula is highly digestible, and natural sources of glucosamine help support healthy joints. We use zero fillers to ensure that each high quality ingredient has a purpose. Give your playful puppy the 100 percent complete and balanced nutrition he needs to support his whole body health when you fill his dish with this premium puppy food formula. There's no need to make your puppy wait for dinner when you can get it quick with an order of Purina ONE dry puppy food from Amazon.com.
feature_bullets: One (1) 16.5 lb. Bag - Purina ONE Natural Dry Puppy Food, SmartBlend Healthy Puppy Formula
Easily digestible rice and oatmeal round out the nutritious recipe
DHA, a nutrient found in mother's milk, supports vision and brain development
Dual-defense antioxidant blend promotes a strong immune system

specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
